name: Simply the Zest Chicken Dinner
description: In a pickle for dinner? Grab a Sheet Pan. It’s large enough to hold the main attraction, plus some sides, without leaving a pile of cleanup. You’ll love how the lemony blend infuses food with zesty, herby flavour, without a single squeeze of fresh lemon or a clove of garlic. This recipe features green beans, which are an affordable, low-calorie veggie; they’re also high in fibre to help you stay fuller, longer. This is basic at its best—put it on weekly repeat!

ingredients.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning or Lemon Chicken Orzo Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 450° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.    
  2. Slice pepper. In a large bowl, combine pepper, chicken, broccoli, green beans, oil, and seasoning; toss until well coated.    
  3. Arrange in a single layer on pan. Roast 18 min, or until chicken is cooked through and veggies are tender.
tips: Streamline cooking and make Steamer Mashed Potatoes in the microwave while the chicken ‘n veggies roast in the oven. Hands-off cooking!
